document.full_text: the vancouver canucks took an early 2-0 lead and held on to beat the nashville predators 2-1 on monday and advance to the nhl's western conference finals.
document.title: canucks beat predators to advance to western finals
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks took an early 2-0 lead and held on to beat the nashville predators 2-1 on monday and advance to the nhl's western conference finals.
